summary: This mod adds a werewolf companion named Mr Snugglesworth in Whiterun near the Shrine of Talos, if you watch Alchestbreach you know what this mod is all about. :D
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a werewolf companion named Mr Snugglesworth in Whiterun near the Shrine of Talos, if you watch Alchestbreach you know what this mod is all about. :D

If you like this mod, please endorse!

The full set: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41008/?]Alchestbreach Companions - Skyrim Redux[/url]

Check out my other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks for your time, enjoy the Nexus!
author: billmineface
